PHRASE.LANG: A little smaller than the "Head Chair," these chairs are for the less important dinner guests.[#Legal]
Une chaise plus petite pour les invités que vous n'aimez pas vraiment.[#Legal]
Etwas niedriger als der Armlehnenstuhl. Diese Stühle sind für die weniger wichtigen Tischgäste gedacht. [#Legal]
Queste sedie, leggermente più piccole di quelle da capotavola, sono perfette per gli ospiti meno importanti.[#Legal]
Algo menores que la silla con brazos, estas se destinan a los invitados menos importantes.[#Legal]
A little smaller than the "Head Chair," these chairs are for the less important dinner guests.[#Legal]
상석의 의자보다는 작으므로, 조금은 덜 중요한 사람을 앉혀 주세요. [#Legal]
A little smaller than the "Head Chair," these chairs are for the less important dinner guests.[#Legal]
這些椅子比有頭靠的椅子稍小，供重要性較低的貴賓使用。[#Legal]
這些椅子比有頭靠的椅子稍小，供重要性較低的貴賓使用。[#Legal]
